        Parameters:

        key - key for encoding
        Returns:
        encoded string
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • formatDouble

        public static java.lang.String formatDouble(double source,
                            int placesCount)
        Format input double number for using with API, if placesCount > 8, it will be replaced to 8.
        Returns:
        Formatted number

      • extendedTrade

        public Trade extendedTrade(java.lang.String pairName,
                  boolean type,
                  java.lang.String rate,
                  java.lang.String amount)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Extended version, over native Trade method, checks input parameters and sets correct decimal places for 'rate'
        Parameters:
        pairName - pair name
        type - buy - true, sell - false
        rate - rate
        amount - amount
        Returns:
        New Trade Object with response from server, not intended for trading.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - with messages constants: EXCEPTION_INFO_NOT_SUCCESS, EXCEPTION_INVALID_PAIR_NAME, EXCEPTION_INVALID_RATE, EXCEPTION_TOO_HIGH_RATE, EXCEPTION_TOO_LOW_RATE, EXCEPTION_INVALID_AMOUNT, EXCEPTION_TOO_LOW_AMOUNT

      • priceDifference

        public double priceDifference(java.lang.String pairName,
                     java.lang.Double targetPrice,
                     int pauseMillis)
        Return the difference between the targetPrice and current last price. May be used for the price alarm. Return Double.MIN_VALUE if has ANY trouble Note: btc-e.com server update data every 2 seconds.
        Parameters:
        pairName - pair name
        targetPrice - target price
        pauseMillis - - pause in milliseconds, may be used "in loop"
        Returns:
        Difference or Double.MIN_VALUE if has ANY trouble

      • tryMaximumBuy

        public double tryMaximumBuy(java.lang.String pairName,
                   long reuseAgeMillis)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Trying to buy maximum for input pair quickly.
        Parameters:
        pairName - pair name
        reuseAgeMillis - - limit for reusing the data, contains in public and private Depth objects. If data inside these objects is younger than this limit, it will be reused, otherwise method will try to get new data. Anyway, public Depth inner states is not changing.
        Returns:
        Remains. For example, for pair BTC-USD, remains may be 0.012 USD on your balance after this operation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - with messages constants: EXCEPTION_MULTIPLE_FAILURE, EXCEPTION_TRADE_NOT_SUCCESS, EXCEPTION_CANCEL_ORDER_NOT_SUCCESS and other from extendedTrade.

      • tryMaximumSell

        public double tryMaximumSell(java.lang.String pairName)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Trying to sell all for input pair quickly.
        Parameters:
        pairName - pair name
        Returns:
        Remains. For example, for pair BTC-USD, remains may be 0.0001 BTC on your balance after this operation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - with messages constants: EXCEPTION_MULTIPLE_FAILURE, EXCEPTION_TRADE_NOT_SUCCESS, EXCEPTION_CANCEL_ORDER_NOT_SUCCESS and other from extendedTrade.
